title: Repeated Bug Splats when trying to load into game (Ascension)
body:
I just sat through the last 20minute low priority queue from the previous bugsplat issue i had this morning. was just about to load the last game and it bug splats before connecting. i restarted client 3 times now.

edit: Initiated full client repair again. hope i dont get additional leaver buster issues due to client issues again
edit2: Full client repair worked. i loaded into the game. thankfully everyone was screwing around and was just doing 1v1s against whoever was ascended .

replies.body: Glad that repair worked out for ya! Typically these bugsplats mean that some game file crapped out on you, and the client didn't know how to handle it which caused the actual bugsplat. Usually, a repair should do the trick, so if it happens again try that and test it in a custom game if you're able to!

well, what really hurts is that even though the client repairs itself, LeaverBuster isnt set up to track if that's an issue. You cant track the difference between an AFK or an accidental loss of connection, but when the client repairs itself, its annoying that it counts because thats my primary issue for my DCs. had to sit through ten 20min queue timers this week because of bugsplats causing me to not load the game in time and my team decides to remake and i get slapped for it.
